snippet: Nearly two-thirds of those stopped by the police in the city between 2007 and 2010 were blacks, even though blacks make up only a quarter of the city’s population, the study found.
lead_paragraph: Nearly two-thirds of those stopped by the police in the city between 2007 and 2010 were blacks, even though blacks make up only a quarter of the city’s population, the study found.

headline.main: Boston Police Focus on Blacks in Disproportionate Numbers, Study Shows
headline.print_headline: Boston Police Focus on Blacks in Disproportionate Numbers, Study Shows
